critique: This document is an executive order focused on assisting veterans in readjusting to civilian life by providing them with employment opportunities within the federal government. It aims to support veterans who may have lost educational or training opportunities due to their military service. The order establishes a 'veterans readjustment appointment' program, allowing agencies to appoint veterans to positions in the competitive service, subject to certain conditions and training programs. It also includes provisions for non-discrimination and outlines eligibility criteria. The document reflects a commitment to supporting veterans and integrating them into the civilian workforce.
